Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.controller.AbstractCrudController<CategoryDto, Long>
com.cb.backend.controller.CategoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudController<CategoryDto, Long>
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/categories") public class CategoryController extends AbstractCrudController<CategoryDto, Long>
REST controller for managing CategoryDto entities.

Provides standard CRUD endpoints inherited from AbstractCrudController:

  • GET /api/categories – list all categories,
  • GET /api/categories/{id} – get a category by ID,
  • POST /api/categories – create a new category,
  • PUT /api/categories/{id} – update an existing category,
  • DELETE /api/categories/{id} – delete a category by ID.

Delegates all operations to CategoryService.
